metaDescription: Discover MIRAGOLF HILLS in Fuente Álamo, Murcia. Luxury penthouses from €229,900 with golf views. Completed December 2026. OREESOL development.

content.heroIntro: MIRAGOLF HILLS represents a prestigious new development by OREESOL in the heart of Hacienda del Alamo, Fuente Álamo, Murcia. This exclusive collection of 2-bedroom penthouses offers modern sophistication combined with uncompromising quality, starting from €229,900. Each penthouse spans 81m² of beautifully designed living space, featuring contemporary finishes and premium amenities that cater to discerning buyers seeking both lifestyle and investment value. Located within an established golf and leisure community, MIRAGOLF HILLS delivers exceptional value—40% less expensive than comparable Spanish island markets—while maintaining proximity to world-class golf courses, pristine beaches, and comprehensive international amenities. With delivery scheduled for December 2026, this development represents an outstanding opportunity to acquire a new home in one of Murcia's most sought-after locations. OREESOL's commitment to quality construction and customer satisfaction ensures your investment is protected with a 10-year structural warranty.

locationSection.intro: Hacienda del Alamo is a mature, well-established golf and residential community in Fuente Álamo, Murcia, renowned for its cosmopolitan atmosphere and excellent quality of life. This strategic location combines the tranquility of a golf resort environment with easy access to essential services, healthcare, education, and leisure activities. The area has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking a Mediterranean lifestyle without the premium price tags of coastal hotspots. Fuente Álamo benefits from a strong English-speaking expatriate community, making integration straightforward for foreign purchasers. The region's infrastructure is excellent, with modern hospitals, international schools offering British curriculum options, and abundant shopping facilities including Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, permanent residence, or investment property, Hacienda del Alamo provides the perfect blend of amenities, accessibility, and natural beauty.

Rental income potential is substantial—penthouses in this location command approximately €800 per week for short-term holiday lets, generating excellent returns for investors. This price differential, combined with robust rental yields and appreciating values, creates a compelling investment case for both owner-occupiers and portfolio builders seeking exposure to Spain's growing property market.

faqs.question: What amenities are near MIRAGOLF HILLS?

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You will need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and should consult with a local lawyer regarding purchase procedures and requirements.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect costs including transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), registration fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1-2% of property price). Our team can provide detailed cost breakdowns.
